[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-release-builder/src/simulate.rs] [Function: simulate_multistep_proposal()] [TTL Manipulation] Scripts use ttl(u64::MAX) - does this allow transactions that would timeout in production, masking time-dependent bugs? (Medium)
